name: murb

scripts.install: cd server && pnpm install && cd ../web && yarn && cd ../server
scripts.start: cd web && yarn start && cd ../server && pnpm start:prod
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd web && yarn dev" "cd server && pnpm run start:dev"
scripts.lint: cd web && yarn lint && cd ../server && pnpm lint
scripts.test: cd web && yarn test && cd ../server && pnpm test
scripts.build: cd web && yarn build && cd ../server && pnpm build
scripts.clean: cd web && rm -rf .next/ && rm -rf .swc/ && cd ../server && rm -rf dist/
scripts.uninstall: rm -rf node_modules && cd web && yarn uninstall && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules

author: OpenGig
description: Sports, music, art, culture and tours - all in one place. Host with us with ease and focus on what matters.
